issue.title: SDF Param Error: Unable to set value for radius

content.raw:
Yes, I experience sdformat [issue #60](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/60/error-when-starting-gazebo-if-lc_numeric) as well, it has always been there though.

Interestingly, on `default`, I get both [issue #60](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/60/error-when-starting-gazebo-if-lc_numeric) and the issue I described, but on branch `model_editor_joint_visuals`, as of revision 3aa243e, which is some commits behind, I only get [issue #60](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/60/error-when-starting-gazebo-if-lc_numeric).

Setting `LC_NUMERIC=C` fixes both issues on both branches.
content.html:
Yes, I experience sdformat issue #60 as well, it has always been there though.

Interestingly, on default, I get both issue #60 and the issue I described, but on branch model_editor_joint_visuals, as of revision 3aa243e, which is some commits behind, I only get issue #60.

Setting LC_NUMERIC=C fixes both issues on both branches.
